data.prayer: Father, help the 259,173 believers in Sagaing to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sagaing, Myanmar (Burma)
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Sagaing, Myanmar (Burma).
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 259,173 believers find a person of peace today among the 5,061,127 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Sagaing access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Palaung, Shwe people.
Over 91.84 percent of the people of Sagaing are far from Jesus.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Sagaing, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sagaing, Myanmar (Burma) has a population of 5,320,300.

We estimate Sagaing has 259,173 people who might know Jesus, 175,087 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,886,040 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 20 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Sagaing.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
